properties.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 7 at 4:01AM EST until February 7 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Binghamton NY
properties.description:
* WHAT...West winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts of 40 to 50 mph
expected.

* WHERE...In Pennsylvania, Pike county. In New York, Sullivan
county.

* WHEN...From noon today to 7 PM EST this evening.

* IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree
limbs could be blown down and scattered power outages may
result.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The strong gusty winds, along with falling
temperatures and scattered snow showers, could also cause wet
roads to become icy. Reduced visibility may occur at times.
properties.instruction:
Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high
profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

NWSheadline: WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 7 PM EST THIS EVENING
